statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({5}+{6.13}\right)}={22.26}\approx{22.26}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{6.13}\cdot{4.94}={30.2822}\approx{30.3}.
